content: Hola Ramesh, gusto en conocerte. Learn "mucho gusto" means "nice to meet you" in Spanish.
hi this is Ramesh what's your name how are you doing today
Hola Ramesh, mi nombre es Rachel. Estoy bien, gracias. Learn "gracias" means "thank you" in Spanish.
hi this is Ramesh what's your name how are you doing today
Hola Ramesh, mi nombre es Rachel. Bien, gracias. Learn "bien" means "good" in Spanish.
Hi, this is Ramesh. Can you tell me the visiting places nearby Phoenix, Arizona?

Sure, some nearby places to visit in Phoenix are Sedona, Grand Canyon and Tombstone. 

¡Claro! Algunos lugares cercanos para visitar en Phoenix son Sedona, Gran Cañón y Tombstone.
